properties.name: Montreal, Canada
properties.description: Posted by MichaelcozziMontreal, CanadaSpent New Years weekend here several years back with my wife, her sister and husband, and several of her sisters friends. Was a good time. Came to the conclusion that Canadians don\'t seem to make as big a deal over New Years as people from the U.S.
